Toggle Menu

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels

Parallels Cloud Module

The Parallels cloud module is used to control access to cloud providers using the Parallels VPS system.

Set up the cloud configuration at /etc/salt/cloud.providers or

/etc/salt/cloud.providers.d/parallels.conf: 

my-parallels-config:
  # Parallels account information
  user: myuser
  password: mypassword
  url: https://api.cloud.xmission.com:4465/paci/v1.0/
  provider: parallels

avail_images

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.avail_images(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the images that are on the provider

create

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.create(
								vm_
								)

Details

Create a single VM from a data dict

create_node

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.create_node(
								vm_
								)

Details

Build and submit the XML to create a node

destroy

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.destroy(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Destroy a node.

CLI Example:

salt-cloud --destroy mymachine

get_configured_provider

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.get_configured_provider( )

Details

Return the first configured instance.

get_image

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.get_image(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the image object to use

list_nodes

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.list_nodes(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider

list_nodes_full

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.list_nodes_full(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider

list_nodes_select

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.list_nodes_select(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider, with select fields

query

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.query(
								action=None,
								command=None,
								args=None,
								method='GET',
								data=None
								)

Details

Make a web call to a Parallels provider

script

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.script(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the script deployment object

show_image

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.show_image(
								kwargs,
								call=None
								)

Details

Show the details from Parallels concerning an image

show_instance

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.show_instance(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Show the details from Parallels concerning an instance

start

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.start(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Start a node.

CLI Example:

salt-cloud -a start mymachine

stop

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.stop(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Stop a node.

CLI Example:

salt-cloud -a stop mymachine

wait_until

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.parallels.wait_until(
								name,
								state,
								timeout=300
								)

Details

Wait until a specific state has been reached on a node
